jhelp.gui

Class LabelBufferedImage

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.Component
      • java.awt.Container
        • javax.swing.JComponent
          • jhelp.gui.LabelBufferedImage
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    DragSource.HaveHeaderLabelBufferedImage

    public class LabelBufferedImage
extends javax.swing.JComponent
    Label with a buffered image.
    You can put an GIF animation in it
    You can also draw a rectangle over image

    Author:
    JHelp
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
